abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.story: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.story: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.

abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 8/12/16/20 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.story: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.
abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.story: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

description: Deals more damage with every hit to the same foe. The fiercest member of his ursine tribe, Ulfsaar makes it his purpose to seek out the evil fomenting beyond his homeland. The Ursa Warrior leaps and Shakes the Ground, slowing foes as he Overpowers them with relentless attacks. His claws dig in to widen the wound, inflicting greater damage with each successive Fury Swipe. An Enraged ursine is a sight to behold. Ignoring all pain, the Ursa Warrior goes into a righteous frenzy, and bears down on his opponents to maul them beyond recognition.  Carry Durable Disabler
trivia: In DotA, Ulfsaar's alternate name was "Fuzzy Wuzzy". This is referenced in one of his spawning lines, where he calls himself Link▶️ "Fuzzy Wuzzy". He does not use his actual name, Ulfsaar, in any of his responses. Lone Druid is the only one who calls him Ulfsaar.
history: Ulfsaar the warrior is the fiercest member of an ursine tribe, protective of his land and his people. During the long winters, while the mothers sleep and nurse their cubs, the males patrol the lands above—as tireless, vigilant defenders of their ancient ways. Hearing dim but growing rumors of a spreading evil, Ulfsaar headed out beyond the boundaries of his wild wooded homeland, intending to track down and destroy the threat at its source, before it could endanger his people. He is a proud creature with a bright strong spirit, utterly trustworthy, a staunch ally and defender.

hero_talents.talent_right: Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a 700 radius
